PLAY.TITLE: The First Part of Henry the Sixth

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: DUKE OF GLOUCESTER, uncle to the King, and Protector.
DUKE OF BEDFORD, uncle to the King, and Regent of France.
THOMAS BEAUFORT, Duke of Exeter, great-uncle to the King.
HENRY BEAUFORT, great-uncle to the King, Bishop of Winchester, and afterwards Cardinal.
JOHN BEAUFORT, Earl, afterwards Duke, of Somerset.
RICHARD PLANTAGENET, son of Richard late Earl of Cambridge, afterwards Duke of York.
LORD TALBOT, afterwards Earl of Shrewsbury.
VERNON, of the White-Rose or York faction.
BASSET, of the Red-Rose or Lancaster faction.
CHARLES, Dauphin, and afterwards King, of France.
REIGNIER, Duke of Anjou, and titular King of Naples.
Master-Gunner of Orleans, and his Son.
General of the French forces in Bourdeaux.
An old Shepherd, father to Joan la Pucelle.
MARGARET, daughter to Reignier, afterwards married to King Henry.
JOAN LA PUCELLE, commonly called Joan of Arc.
Lords, Warders of the Tower, Heralds, Officers, Soldiers, Messengers, and Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Partly in England, and partly in France.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Westminster Abbey.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Dead March. Enter the Funeral of KING HENRY the
Fifth, attended on by Dukes of BEDFORD, Regent of
France; GLOUCESTER, Protector; and EXETER, Earl of
WARWICK, the BISHOP OF WINCHESTER, Heralds, & c

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. France. Before Orleans.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Sound a flourish. Enter CHARLES, ALENCON, and
REIGNIER, marching with drum and Soldiers

Here alarum; they are beaten back by t he English
with great loss. Re-enter CHARLES, ALENCON, and REIGNIER
Re-enter the BASTARD OF ORLEANS, with JOAN LA PUCELLE
Here they fight, and JOAN LA PUCELLE overcomes

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. London. Before the Tower.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GLOUCESTER, with his Serving-men in blue coats

Gloucester's men rush at the Tower Gates, and
WOODVILE the Lieutenant speaks within

Enter to the Protector at the Tower Gates BISHOP
OF WINCHESTER and his men in tawny coats

Here GLOUCESTER's men beat out BISHOP OF
WINCHESTER's men, and enter in the hurly-
burly the Mayor of London and his Officers

Exeunt, severally, GLOUCESTER and BISHOP OF
WINCHESTER with their Serving-men

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Orleans.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter, on the walls, a Master Gunner and his Boy

Enter, on the turrets, SALISBURY and TALBOT,
GLANSDALE, GARGRAVE, and others
Enter the Boy with a linstock
Here they shoot. SALISBURY and GARGRAVE fall

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TALBOT
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Here an alarum, and it thunders and lightens

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Here SALISBURY lifteth himself up and groans

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Here an alarum again: and TALBOT pursueth the
DAUPHIN, and driveth him: then enter JOAN LA
PUCELLE, driving Englishmen before her, and exit
after them then re-enter TALBOT

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JOAN LA PUCELLE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: A short alarum; then enter the town with soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, on the walls, JOAN LA PUCELLE, CHARLES,
REIGNIER, ALENCON, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before Orleans.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter a Sergeant of a band with two Sentinels

Enter TALBOT, BEDFORD, BURGUNDY, and Forces, with
scaling-ladders, their drums beating a dead march

The French leap over the walls in their shirts.
Enter, several ways, the BASTARD OF ORLEANS,
ALENCON, and REIGNIER, half ready, and half unready
Enter CHARLES and JOAN LA PUCELLE

Alarum. Enter an English Soldier, crying 'A
Talbot! a Talbot!' They fly, leaving their
clothes behind

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Orleans. Within the town.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter TALBOT, BEDFORD, BURGUNDY, a Captain, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Auvergne. The COUNTESS's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the COUNTESS and her Porter

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TALBOT
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Winds his horn. Drums strike up: a peal of
ordnance. Enter soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. London. The Temple-garden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the Earls of SOMERSET, SUFFOLK, and WARWICK;
RICHARD PLANTAGENET, VERNON, and another Lawyer

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The Tower of London.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MORTIMER, brought in a chair, and Gaolers

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RICHARD PLANTAGENET
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt Gaolers, bearing out the body of MORTIMER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. The Parliament-house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING HENRY VI, EXETER, GLOUCESTER,
WARWICK, SOMERSET, and SUFFOLK; the BISHOP OF
WINCHESTER, RICHARD PLANTAGENET, and others.
GLOUCESTER offers to put up a bill; BISHOP OF
WINCHESTER snatches it, and tears it

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING HENRY VI
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: A noise within, 'Down with the tawny-coats!'

SCENE.STAGEDIR: A noise again, 'Stones! stones!' Enter Mayor
Enter Serving-men, in skirmish, with bloody pates
Sennet. Flourish. Exeunt all but EXETER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. France. Before Rouen.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter JOAN LA PUCELLE disguised, with four Soldiers
with sacks upon their backs

Enter CHARLES, the BASTARD OF ORLEANS, ALENCON,
REIGNIER, and forces

Enter JOAN LA PUCELLE on the top, thrusting out a
torch burning
An alarum. Enter TALBOT in an excursion

An alarum: excursions. BEDFORD, brought in sick
in a chair. Enter TALBOT and BURGUNDY without:
within JOAN LA PUCELLE, CHARLES, BASTARD OF ORLEANS,
ALENCON, and REIGNIER, on the walls

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JOAN LA PUCELLE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: The English whisper together in council

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all but BEDFORD and Attendants

An alarum: excursions. Enter FASTOLFE and
a Captain

Retreat: excursions. JOAN LA PUCELLE, ALENCON,
and CHARLES fly
BEDFORD dies, and is carried in by two in his chair
An alarum. Re-enter TALBOT, BURGUNDY, and the rest

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The plains near Rouen.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter CHARLES, the BASTARD OF ORLEANS, ALENCON, JOAN
LA PUCELLE, and forces

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JOAN LA PUCELLE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Here sound an English march. Enter, and pass over
at a distance, TALBOT and his forces
French march. Enter BURGUNDY and forces

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Paris. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING HENRY VI, GLOUCESTER, BISHOP OF
WINCHESTER, YORK, SUFFOLK, SOMERSET, WARWICK,
EXETER, VERNON BASSET, and others. To them
with his Soldiers, TALBOT
Sennet. Flourish. Exeunt all but VERNON and BASSET

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Paris. A hall of state.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING HENRY VI, GLOUCESTER, BISHOP OF
WINCHESTER, YORK, SUFFOLK, SOMERSET, WARWICK,
TALBOT, EXETER, the Governor, of Paris, and others

Flourish. Exeunt all but YORK, WARWICK, EXETER
and VERNON

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Before Bourdeaux.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter TALBOT, with trump and drum

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TALBOT
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Trumpet sounds. Enter General and others, aloft

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Plains in Gascony.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter a Messenger that meets YORK. Enter YORK
with trumpet and many Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Other plains in Gascony.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter SOMERSET, with his army; a Captain of
TALBOT's with him

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The English camp near Bourdeaux.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter TALBOT and JOHN his son

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. A field of battle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum: excursions, wherein JOHN TALBOT is
hemmed about, and TALBOT rescues him

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum: excursions. Enter TALBOT led by a Servant
Enter Soldiers, with the body of JOHN TALBOT

Enter CHARLES, ALENCON, BURGUNDY, BASTARD OF
ORLEANS, JOAN LA PUCELLE, and forces

Enter Sir William LUCY, attended; Herald of the
French preceding

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Sennet. Enter KING HENRY VI, GLOUCESTER, and EXETER

Enter CARDINAL OF WINCHESTER in Cardinal's habit,
a Legate and two Ambassadors
Exeunt all but CARDINAL OF WINCHESTER and Legate

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. France. Plains in Anjou.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter CHARLES, BURGUNDY, ALENCON, BASTARD OF
ORLEANS, REIGNIER, JOAN LA PUCELLE, and forces

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Before Angiers.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum. Excursions. Enter JOAN LA PUCELLE

Excursions. Re-enter JOAN LA PUCELLE fighting hand
to hand with YORK JOAN LA PUCELLE is taken. The
French fly
Alarum. Enter SUFFOLK with MARGARET in his hand

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SUFFOLK
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: A parley sounded. Enter REIGNIER on the walls

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Camp of the YORK in Anjou.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter JOAN LA PUCELLE, guarded, and a Shepherd

Enter CHARLES, ALENCON, BASTARD OF ORLEANS,
REIGNIER, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter SUFFOLK in conference with KING HENRY VI,
GLOUCESTER and EXETER
